properties.label: Reference Name
properties.name: referenceName
properties.description: Reference specifies the name to be used to track this external source

properties.label: Hostname
properties.name: hostname
properties.description: Hostname of the SQL Server from which the data needs to be offloaded. Ex: mysqlserver.net or 12.123.12.123

properties.label: Username
properties.name: username
properties.description: Username to use to connect to the specified database. Required for databases that need authentication. Optional for databases that do not require authentication

properties.label: Password
properties.name: password
properties.description: Password to use to connect to the specified database. Required for databases that need authentication. Optional for databases that do not require authentication

properties.label: Database name
properties.name: dbname
properties.description: SQL Server database name which needs to be tracked. Note: Change Tracking must be enabled on the database for the source to read the chage data

properties.label: Generate CDC Sequence Number in output schema
properties.name: sqn
properties.description: Need the CDC Sequence Number in the output schema

properties.label: Table Name
properties.name: tableName
properties.description: Table name for CT Information (Comma seperated for multiple tables)

properties.label: Max Batch Size
properties.name: maxBatchSize
properties.description: Size of a record batch per pipeline batch interval
